titles.title: Keeping American Businesses Competitive Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum corporate rate of tax to 22 percent.
Keeping American Businesses Competitive Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Keeping American Businesses Competitive Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum income tax rate on corporations, including personal service corporations, from 35 to 22%.
